There are many reasons why autumn is a great time for meetings and events in Copenhagen, and Sabrina Meyers (she/her) - Events and Social Media walks us through some of them in the video below.üëá We‚Äôve reached the last month of autumn, and while temperatures have dipped and the weather has turned a little bit more unstable, it‚Äôs actually a great time for meeting and event planners to experience Copenhagen.üçÅ üìçEverything is less crowded compared to summer üìçThe city is full of great museums and indoor venues üìçIt's easier to get a table at your preferred restaurant üìçThe city is full of events and activities üìçShorter days mean more ‚Äúhygge‚Äù üìç The Gl√∏gg (mulled wine) season kicks off And, of course, you still have access to the same great hotels and venues.üçÅ #eventprofs #meetingprofs #copenhagen #mice

Melbourne International Coffee Expo May 2024 One for the caffiene fiends - find out why Mebourne, Australia is the only place you'll ever want to sip a flat white... The Melbourne International Coffee Expo (MICE) is great news for any and all international students studying for a career in the #hospitality #tourism #hotel #caf√© industries. Well, anyone interested in employment or even oppening their own quiet cafe really... Wise Words Media is covering this ears expo - it makes compelling content. We're seeking commercial collaboration with forward-thinking #ottplatforms and #OTT partners for distribution to global audiences. #hospitality #tourism #hotel #caf√© are sectors in high demand for employees! Returning to Melbourne‚Äôs Convention and Exhibition Centre, the Melbourne International Coffee Expo 2024 is scheduled to take place from May 12th to May 14th, between 10:00 am and 5:00 pm. MEET YOUR FUTURE EMPLOYERS!! The exhibition offers abundant networking avenues. Melbourne International Coffee Expo 2024 has garnered a reputation across the Asia Pacific region as the premier and most dynamic coffee-centric event. Complemented by Melbourne Coffee Week, the expo is undoubtedly the highlight of the year! MICE has garnered a reputation across the Asia Pacific region as the premier and most dynamic coffee-centric event. * Since its inception in 2012, it has evolved into an indispensable gathering for all members of the coffee industry. * With nearly 11,000 participants in 2023, MICE serves as a vital platform bringing together caf√© proprietors, roasters, equipment producers, service providers, and others, fostering genuine business prospects. * Across the three-day show, MICE will offer unparalleled features where education, innovation and experience collide under one roof. -- -- #OTT content -- #coffee #coffeelovers #internationalstudentlife #streaming #digital #streaming #film #film #content #media #melbourne #project #australia #development #content #technology #education #intled #MelbMoment #internationalstudents

BUDAPEST ‚Äì MTLG Destination Update 2023 New Europe‚Äôs capital for megaevents WHY BUDAPEST? Five great reasons to organise an event in Budapest: 1. World-class hotel offer The selection of hotels is diverse, cosmopolitan and suited to all tastes. Budapest is one of the leading destinations in the region in this segment. 2. Glamorous meeting venues Only a handful of European cities boast as many meeting venues as Budapest. Most of them are affordable and flexible for hosting events. 3. Culinary revolution Hungarians are gastronomical masters, even in fine dining. The catering offer in Budapest is world-class, too, and offers excellent value for money. 4. New conference centre The new Hungexpo Conference Centre beautifully complements the offer. Budapest can now host events for over 2,500 attendees. 5. First-rate production Several AV and multimedia companies based in Budapest can organise the most demanding event productions. They can support everything from drone shows to a Rolling Stones concert. Read full story on KONGRES MAGAZINE #budapest #meetingsandevents #events #eventprofs #neweurope #meetingsindustry #meetingprofs #meetings #megaevent

https://lnkd.in/g2_HJ6PS Discover Argentina: From Tango to Natural Wonders Argentina, located in South America, is a captivating country that offers a diverse range of experiences for travelers. From its vibrant culture to stunning landscapes, Argentina has something to offer for everyone. In this blog, we will explore the fascinating aspects of Argentina, including its geography, culture, tourist attractions, gastronomy, sports, festivals, wildlife, economy, safety, education, and more Argentina boasts a remarkable geographical diversity. It spans from the Andes Mountains in the west to the Atlantic Ocean in the east. The country is known for its vast plains, lush rainforests, towering glaciers, and breathtaking waterfalls. The climate in Argentina varies from region to region, ranging from tropical in the north to subpolar in the south, allowing visitors to experience a wide range of climates and landscapes.
